SELECT QP.PLNT_CD, QP.PITM_CD, QP.PITM_VER, QP.SPEC_PROC_CD, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = QP.SPEC_PROC_CD) AS SPEC_PROC_NM, QP.USE_VER_YN, QP.RVS_NO, QP.DOC_NO, QP.RVS_DT, QP.ENFO_DT, QP.RVS_REA_CD, QP.RVS_CTT, QP.RVS_DIV_PS, QP.REVW_UID, QP.REVW_DS, QP.REVW_IP, QP.PITM_MST_APR_IDX, QP.RJT_UID, QP.RJT_DS, QP.RJT_REA, QPI.PITM_TYP, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND DTL_CD = QPI.PITM_TYP) AS PITM_TYP_NM, QPI.PITM_NM, QPI.PITM_EN, QPI.SAP_PRDHA, QPI.ANS_DUR_DAY, QPI.CRG_DPT_CD, (SELECT DPT_NM FROM SY_DPT WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND DPT_CD = QPI.CRG_DPT_CD) AS CRG_DPT_NM, QPI.SPCM_NO, QPI.MIC_YN, QPI.CLLT_MTD, QPI.CLLT_MCN, QPI.CLLT_PLA, QPI.SMP_STRG_MTD, QPI.SMP_VOL_UNIT, QPI.SMP_VOL_ANS, QPI.SMP_VOL_ETC, QPI.SMP_VOL_MNG FROM QM_PITM QP, QM_PITM_INFO QPI WHERE QP.PLNT_CD = QPI.PLNT_CD AND QP.PITM_CD = QPI.PITM_CD AND QP.PITM_VER = QPI.PITM_VER AND QP.DEL_YN = 'N' AND QP.USE_VER_YN = 'Y'
AND QPI.PITM_TYP = #{pitmTyp}
AND UPPER(QP.PITM_CD) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{pitmCd}) || '%'
AND UPPER(QPI.PITM_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{pitmNm}) || '%'
ORDER BY UDT_DS DESC

SELECT EEI.PLNT_CD, EEI.EQM_CD, EEI.EQM_NM, EEI.EQM_DIV, EEI.EQM_CRST, EEI.EQM_STT, EEI.IST_PLA, EEI.MAK_COMP, EEI.SPL_COMP, EEI.MOD_NM, EEI.SRL_NO, EEI.CRG_UID, EEI.IQ, EEI.OQ, EEI.PQ, EEI.APR_NO, EEI.CHK_CYL, EEI.QUA_CYL, EEI.CAL_CYL, EEI.ETR_DT, EEI.IST_DT, EEI.DPS_DT, EEI.QUAL_APR_DT, EEI.CAL_APR_DT, EEI.RGL_CHK_APR_DT, EEI.USE_RNG, EEI.QTT_RNG, EEI.RMK, EEI.EQM_FILE_IDX, EEI.SAP_AST_NO, EEI.SAP_AST_NM, EEI.SAP_CRT_DT, EEI.SAP_CHG_DT, EEI.SAP_ACQ_DT, EEI.SAP_SALE_DPS_DT, EEI.SAP_ADD_DESC, EEI.SAP_CRG_NM_EMID, EEI.SAP_COSC, EEI.SAP_ORCO, EEI.SAP_ACCD, EEI.PMS_CHK_TAGT_YN, EEU.USE_SEQ, EEU.USE_STR_DS, EEU.USE_END_DS, EEU.PITM_NM, EEU.ANS_NO, EEU.BATCH_NO, EEU.AITM_NM, EEU.ANS_UID, EEU.RMK FROM EM_EQM_INFO EEI, EM_EQM_USE EEU WHERE EEI.PLNT_CD = EEU.PLNT_CD AND EEI.EQM_CD = EEU.EQM_CD AND EEI.DEL_YN = 'N' AND EEU.DEL_YN = 'N'
